conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
singer contains tables such as singer.
Table singer has columns such as singer_id, name, birth_year, net_worth_millions, citizenship.
conversations.query: Show the citizenship shared by singers with birth year before 1945 and after 1955.
conversations.answer: select citizenship from singer where birth_year < 1945 intersect select citizenship from singer where birth_year > 1955;
